name: Catch That Bug!
description:
Live a day in the life as a semicolon! Avoid dangerous code blocks as they fall from a seemingly unreachable programming bug. Use double and triple jumps to boost your way to the top! 

Instructions:

WASD or arrow keys to play. ESC or P to pause. M to mute.

Tip: You get an extra jump if your final jump is off a wall!

Add or follow me @poop$games
